name: Law-Enforcement-Audio-Analysis
description: Analyse audio conversations in law enforcement scenarios in-depth

appStages.name: Introduction
Audio Transcript
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eAudio Transcription\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Upload an audio file and relevant context of the law enforcement interrogation / court proceedings (\u003c25 MB) and hit \u0027Diarize\u0027 to generate the audio transcript. \u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html4",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Number of Speakers",
              "description": "Enter the number of speakers engaging in the audio file",
              "customClass": "m-4",
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "2",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "speakers_count",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            },
            {
              "label": "Audio Context",
              "placeholder": "E.g. An officer is conducting behavioral analysis",
              "description": "Briefly describe what the audio recording is about",
              "customClass": "m-4",
              "tableView": true,
              "key": "context",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Upload a File",
              "description": "An audio file in a compatible format (.mp3, .wav, .m4a, .ogg)",
              "customClass": "p-4",
              "tableView": false,
              "storage": "base64",
              "webcam": false,
              "fileTypes": [
                {
                  "label": "",
                  "value": ""
                }
              ],
              "validate": {
                "required": true
              },
              "key": "file",
              "type": "file",
              "input": true
            },
            {
              "label": "Columns",

appStages.name: Conversation Analysis
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eConversation Analysis\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Click on \u0027Analyze\u0027 to get an analytical report for the conversation which covers sentiment, tone and emotion analysis for each speaker involved. Detection of linguistic elements, important word clouds are also included.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html7",

      "input": false,
